lead_paragraph: An online dispute erupted over the heritage of Meb Keflezighi, the first American to win the New York City Marathon in 27 years.
snippet: An online dispute erupted over the heritage of Meb Keflezighi, the first American to win the New York City Marathon in 27 years.
